Start a full debugging and testing session on http://localhost:3000.  
Act as an expert tester: explore all pages, API routes, Supabase integration, i18n behavior, and UI responsiveness.  
Document every issue with severity, location, description, cause, and suggested fix.  
Produce a structured, token-efficient Markdown TODO report of all findings for Claude Sonnet 4.5 implementation.  
Focus on completeness, accuracy, and technical clarity.
